Event.name: Fire_stopping_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>The Fire_stopping_scenario begins with a <fen>Fire</fen> in process, transitions with the action of an <fen>Agent</fen> to end the <fen>Fire</fen>, and ends with the <fen>Fire</fen> having stopped burning.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> puts out the <fen>Fire</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.
<ex>The fire <t>went out</t> <fex name="Time">last night</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The individual or group that causes the <fen>Fire</fen> to no longer burn.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Fire
Arg.definition: <def-root>The combustion process that the <fen>Agent</fen> causes to end.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the how near the <fen>Agent</fen> is to putting out the <fen>Fire</fen>. </def-root>
